# Create a Realistic Dust Particle Effect

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/create-a-realistic-dust-particle-effect-in-unreal-editor-for-fortnite
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-26T23:19:37.165690

---

This tutorial shows you how to create a dust particle in [Niagara](unreal-editor-for-fortnite-glossary#niagara). Through this process, you’ll learn how to determine the size of dust particles and dust scatter, and how to use an [emitter](unreal-editor-for-fortnite-glossary#emitter) shape to contain the dust scatter.

The following sections take you through the necessary steps for generating a new effect. You will create a custom material, then use a Hanging Particulates emitter to create the dust particle effect.

Follow each section in the sequence laid out. If you skip a section in this tutorial, your effect will not behave as expected.

## Overview

Following is an overview of the steps you'll need to recreate this dust effect, and their ideal sequence:

1. Create the dust particle material and Niagara emitter.
2. Edit the emitter sprites.
3. Edit the emitter shape.

## Sections

These sections take you through how to create a dust particle effect:
